snippet: Representative Darrell Issa accused Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. of withholding information in the botched gun trafficking case known as Operation Fast and Furious.
abstract: Rep Darrell Issa and Attorney General Eric H Holder Jr clash once again during a hearing before the House Judiciary Committee on the botched gun trafficking case known as Operation Fast and Furious; Issa accuses Holder of withholding information requested in a 2011 subpoena.
lead_paragraph: Representative Darrell Issa accused Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. of withholding information in the botched gun trafficking case known as Operation Fast and Furious.

headline.seo: Holder and Rep. Issa Clash Again Over Fast and Furious
headline.main: New Clash in Congress on Gun Case Gone Wrong
headline.print_headline: New Clash In Congress On Gun Case Gone Wrong

keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
